doc.after: The opening of the Manchester Arndale in 1975 shifted the retail focus towards the area bounded by Market Street Corporation Street Withy Grove and High Street Despite the Arndale s unpopularity with many critics it has been described as an outstandingly successful shopping centre by visitor numbers and spending Today the Arndale attracts 41 million visitors a year and is the largest city centre shopping centre in the United Kingdom
